S

server - package server
Core HTTP server classes.
Servlet - Interface in servlets
A servlet is a stateless object that knows how to handle a single HTTP request and write the response back to the client.
servlets - package servlets
Contains the Servlet interface and a few ready-made servlet implementations.

T

Topic - Class in graph
A node in the reactive graph that holds a value and notifies subscribed agents when a new Message is published.

Actual implementation holder; exposed methods delegate here.
